net.threescale.api.v2

Interface Api2

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Api2Impl

    public interface Api2
    Version 2 of the 3Scale API.

    This version is not compatible with Version 1. See https://support.3scale.net/reference/activedocs#/service_management_api for more details

    • Method Detail

      • authorize

        AuthorizeResponse authorize(String app_id,
                          String app_key,
                          String referrer)
                            throws ApiException
        Authorize access and fetch the current statistics for an application.
        Parameters:
        app_id - Application Id give by user
        app_key - Optional Application Key (or null)
        referrer - Optional referrer ip address (or null)'
        Returns:
        AuthorizeResponse containing the current usage metrics.
        Throws:
        ApiException - if there is an error connection to the server

      • authorize

        AuthorizeResponse authorize(String app_id,
                          String app_key,
                          String referrer,
                          HashMap<String,String> usage_metrics)
                            throws ApiException
        Authorize access and fetch the current statistics for an application for specific metrics
        Parameters:
        app_id - Application Id give by user
        app_key - Optional Application Key (or null)
        referrer - Optional referrer ip address (or null)'
        usage_metrics - Optional set of key:value pairs of metrics to be checked @return AuthorizeResponse containing the current usage metrics.
        Throws:
        ApiException - if there is an error connection to the server

      • authorizeWithUserKey

        AuthorizeResponse authorizeWithUserKey(String user_key,
                                     String referrer,
                                     HashMap<String,String> usage_metrics)
                                       throws ApiException
        Throws:
        ApiException

      • report

        void report(ApiTransaction[] transactions)
            throws ApiException
        Send a set of usage data to the server
        Parameters:
        transactions - Usage data to be recorded
        Throws:
        ApiException - if there is an error connection to the server

        `get the url of the 3scale server
